audio_description: Today we'll show you how to make mutton biryani at home. This biryani tastes like restaurant-style, and you can see the vibrant colors in it. This recipe turns out very tasty.

audio_description: Put the marinated meat into a pressure cooker and cook it 90% through. Add a little water, not too much. Don’t fully cook it, only 90%, as this is not raw meat-style biryani.
